verses.roman:
puruṣa-nāsāte yabe bāhirāya śvāsa
niśvāsa sahite haya brahmāṇḍa-prakāśa

synonyms: puruṣa-nāsāte—in the nostrils of the Lord; yabe—when; bāhirāya—expels; śvāsa—breath; niśvāsa sahite—with that exhalation; haya—there is; brahmāṇḍa-prakāśa—manifestation of universes.
translation: When the puruṣa exhales, the universes become manifest with each outward breath.
